14
15#ifndef DNS_TTL_H
16#define DNS_TTL_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/ttl.h */
19
20/***
21 *** Imports
22 ***/
23
24#include <inttypes.h>
25#include <stdbool.h>
26
27#include <isc/lang.h>
28#include <isc/types.h>
29
30ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
31
32/***
33 *** Functions
34 ***/
35
36isc_result_t
37dns_ttl_totext(uint32_t src, bool verbose,
38 bool upcase, isc_buffer_t *target);
39/*%<
40 * Output a TTL or other time interval in a human-readable form.
41 * The time interval is given as a count of seconds in 'src'.
42 * The text representation is appended to 'target'.
43 *
44 * If 'verbose' is false, use the terse BIND 8 style, like "1w2d3h4m5s".
45 *
46 * If 'verbose' is true, use a verbose style like the SOA comments
47 * in "dig", like "1 week 2 days 3 hours 4 minutes 5 seconds".
48 *
49 * If 'upcase' is true, we conform to the BIND 8 style in which
50 * the unit letter is capitalized if there is only a single unit
51 * letter to print (for example, "1m30s", but "2M")
52 *
53 * If 'upcase' is false, unit letters are always in lower case.
54 *
55 * Returns:
56 * \li ISC_R_SUCCESS
57 * \li ISC_R_NOSPACE
58 */
59
60isc_result_t
61dns_counter_fromtext(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl);
62/*%<
63 * Converts a counter from either a plain number or a BIND 8 style value.
64 *
65 * Returns:
66 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS
67 *\li DNS_R_SYNTAX
68 */
69
70isc_result_t
71dns_ttl_fromtext(isc_textregion_t *source, uint32_t *ttl);
72/*%<
73 * Converts a ttl from either a plain number or a BIND 8 style value.
74 *
75 * Returns:
76 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS
77 *\li DNS_R_BADTTL
78 */
79
80ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
81
82#endif /* DNS_TTL_H */
83
